name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven DevOps Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in implementing CI/CD pipelines and container orchestration using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Jenkins**. Proficient in infrastructure as code (IaC) with **Terraform** and **AWS CloudFormation**, I streamline development processes and enhance deployment efficiency. Expertise in version control using **Git** and automating workflows with **GitHub Actions** ensures robust and traceable releases.

With a solid background in cloud services, specializing in **AWS**, I design and maintain scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud environments. My strong foundation in full-stack development supports collaboration with development teams to build high-performance solutions that comply with rigorous standards. Passionate about integrating innovative technologies into best practices for deployment and operational management.
